interface.name: org.alljoyn.SmartSpaces.Environment.AirQualityLevel
interface.description: This information provides represented air quality level measured by an appliance.

property.name: CurrentLevel
property.description: The qualitative representation of current relative air quality level.

property.name: MaxLevel
property.description: Maximum level allowed for represented air quality level.

method.name: GetAirQualityLevelInfo
method.description: Get added info about the air quality levels in string format.
